text: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
translation.id.indonesian: Lalu mereka melemparkan tali temali dan tongkat-tongkat mereka dan berkata: "Demi kekuasaan Fir'aun, sesungguhnya kami benar-benar akan menang".
